account_switcher_info: Hold the sticker button in private chats to access the account switcher.
account_visibility_subtext: Hide/show accounts by long-pressing theme button
add_to_folder_all_tabs: Add to Folder in All Tabs
add_to_folder_all_tabs_subtext: Enables 'Add to folder' option in all folder tabs, not just the All chats tab
another_services: If the provided services are not available in your country, you can contact me via direct message
ayugram_deeplink_message: This AyuGram link may redirect to automatically playing content with blocked controls.
clear_recent_chats_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all recent chats?
code_formatting_subtext: Adds code blocks and mentions in the format menu
confirm_deeplink_message:
Do you really want to open this deep link?
{url}
confirm_forward_message: Are you sure you want to forward this message?
confirm_send_message: Do you really want to send this {message_type}?
context_menu_info: These will add items to the context menu that appears when you tap on any message.
deeplink_confirmation_info: These toggles add confirmation dialogs before opening deep links to prevent accidental navigation to external content.
disable_article_viewer_swipe: Disable article viewer swipe to close
disable_swipe_gestures: Add disable in chat list swipe gesture menu
disable_swipe_subtext: Add disable option to chat list swipe menu
do_not_share_phone_number: Do Not Share My Phone Number
donation_info_description: Donations are a way to appreciate the effort behind this Plugin. They donâ€™t grant special privileges, though you may request a feature as thanks.
donation_info_footer: Thank you for considering supporting the development of UiTweaks!
dont_auto_play_info: Prevents automatic playback of the next voice or video message in a chat, giving you control over when media plays.
dont_auto_play_next_video: Don't Auto Play Next Video Message
dont_auto_play_next_voice: Don't Auto Play Next Voice Message
gif_spoiler_subtext: Add spoiler effect and captions to GIFs - except topics
hide_archived_chats_info: This will remove archived chats from the chat list by filtering them out of the dialogs query.
hide_birthday_alert_info: Hides the birthday setup suggestion that appears in the chat list.
hide_bot_button: Hide bot button in input field
hide_bot_open: Hide bot 'Open' button in chat list
hide_hd_icon: Hide HD icon in media picker
hide_hd_icon_info: This will only remove the HD icon from the media picker. It will not affect the quality of the media.
hide_phone_number_info: This will hide the recipient's phone number from their profile.
join_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to join **{chat_name}**?
localization_bottom_text: This process only happens once. After downloading, the files are saved locally to give you seamless access to UiTweaks in your language anytime.
localization_continue_text: The plugin will continue to work in English. Check back later for localization updates.
localization_not_available_description: UiTweaks localization for {language} is not available yet.
memory_dump_no_freed: Memory dump completed. No significant memory was freed.
memory_warning_message:
High memory usage: {used_mb}MB.

Restart app or dump memory?
menu_visibility_info: This will force the buttons to always show in the action bar.
message_preview_subtext: Send the media from available link preview
miscellaneous_features_info: Disable features from this list that you don't use actively to maintain performance.
navigation_controls_info: This will prevent the telegram navigation gestures to work from these scenarios.
performance_warning_description: UiTweaks adds advanced features in {client_name} but may impact device performance over time.
performance_warning_footer: For optimal performance, consider reviewing your enabled features regularly and keeping only what you need active.
prefer_common_groups_tab_info: Automatically selects the Groups tab instead of Gifts tab in user profiles when both are available.
prevent_webapp_swipe_down: Prevent swipe down in webapp bots
progress_timestamp_info: Shows the current playback time and total duration on voice and video messages for better media control.
recent_chats_menu_info: Shows recent chats when long-pressing the drawer icon in chat list. Stores up to 20 chats.
reset_confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset?
reset_preferences_description: Reset all application settings including themes, language, notifications, and user configurations. This action cannot be undone.
select_all_dialogs_subtext: Add 'Select All' option to chat list menu
sender_select_subtext: Show personal account in send message as menu where you are the owner of the group
share_sheet_folders_subtext: Include folders in direct share sheet
thank_you_message:
Thank you for using UiTweaks! Feedback?
Join: @QuantaPlugins
unlock_uitweaks_description: Unlock UiTweaks in {language} for a seamless experience.
unread_count_info: Adjust how unread counters behave in folders. When both are enabled, only non-muted chats are counted.
